entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
